<center>
## Projects 
</center>

R Packages
-------------------------------------

* **[gerp](https://mjfrigaard.github.io/gerp/)** Good enough R practices [[**Repo**](https://github.com/mjfrigaard/gerp)]

* **[shinypak](https://mjfrigaard.github.io/shinypak/)** Quickly access the Shiny applications in [Shiny App-Packages (book)](https://mjfrigaard.github.io/shiny-app-pkgs/) [[**Repo**](https://github.com/mjfrigaard/shinypak)]


Miscellaneous Side Projects
-------------------------------------
* [**Shiny Frameworks (website)**](https://mjfrigaard.github.io/sfw/) a demo Shiny app using three popular Shiny frameworks (`golem`, `leprechaun`, and `rhino`) [[**Repo**](https://github.com/mjfrigaard/sfw)]

* [**msst2ap**](https://mjfrigaard.github.io/msst2ap/) _**M**astering **S**hiny **s**hiny**t**est**2** **a**pp-**p**ackage_ demonstrates how to test a Shiny app-package using [`testthat`](https://testthat.r-lib.org/) and [`shinytest2`](https://rstudio.github.io/shinytest2/). All examples come from the [Modules chapter of Mastering Shiny.](https://mastering-shiny.org/scaling-modules.html) [[**Repo**](https://github.com/mjfrigaard/msst2ap)]

* [**mstsap**](https://mjfrigaard.github.io/mstsap/) _**M**astering **S**hiny **t**`est`**S**`erver()` **a**pp-**p**ackage_ is a collection of tests using [`testthat`](https://testthat.r-lib.org/) and
[`shiny::testServer()`](https://search.r-project.org/CRAN/refmans/shiny/html/testServer.html) The modules and application in `mstsap` come from the [Shiny modules chapter](https://mastering-shiny.org/scaling-modules.html) of [Mastering Shiny](https://mastering-shiny.org/index.html) [[**Repo**](https://github.com/mjfrigaard/mstsap)]

* [**dopingdata**](https://mjfrigaard.github.io/dopingdata/) `dopingdata` contains data from the [United States Anti-Doping Agency](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_Anti-Doping_Agency) for exploration, modeling, and visualizations. The datasets in this package are derived from from the [USADA website](https://www.usada.org/) and the [World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) banned substances list](https://www.wada-ama.org/en/prohibited-list?q=) [[**Repo**](https://github.com/mjfrigaard/dopingdata)]
